name: cam-marketplace
description: Personal Claude Code plugin marketplace with opinionated, quality-enforcing plugins for documentation, testing, and static analysis

plugins.name: documentation-standards
plugins.description: Enforces documentation standards using markdownlint, vale, and Diataxis documentation types. Ensures all documentation is high-quality, consistent, and error-free.

plugins.name: pytest-standards
plugins.description: Enforces opinionated pytest testing standards, ensures all tests pass, maintains code coverage, and promotes property-based testing with Hypothesis. Never satisfied until tests pass and coverage is maintained.

plugins.name: static-analysis
plugins.description: Enforces code quality through static analysis tools, prek pre-commit hooks, and MegaLinter. Discovers quality standards, recommends appropriate tools, and prevents manual recursion over files. Never satisfied until all issues resolved or explicitly ignored.
